**Example 1: 示例1**



Input: 

```
tccli keewidb DescribeTaskInfo --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --TaskId 1634784500
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "InstanceId": "kee-97ww****",
        "RequestId": "52fa67f2-4b65-423d-b78b-9d37baf5e313",
        "StartTime": "2022-03-16 22:17:54",
        "Status": "succeed",
        "TaskMessage": "",
        "TaskType": ""
    }
}
```
